attributes.action: bring Charges against ministers for fraudulent claims for expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I cannot understand why the POLICE have not been involved around ALL the current expense that have been fraudulently claimed by mp's as a uk citizen who pays taxes to the UK GOVERMENT I demand that these mp's be made to Stand up in court and explain their THEFT OF UK TAX PAYERS MONEY. Because I know if i fraudulently claimed expenses from my employer i,m sure the Police would be involved.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
